children.value:
Over the years Kerberos evolved into a mature and stable session. Lots of people and companies started to adopt the system, and requested enhancements. Every
solution has its limitations, and so has the Open Source version of Kerberos.

Kerberos Open Source is perfect when monitoring a limited set of surveillance cameras, but it is not scalable if you plan to monitor dozens or hundreds. Although Kerberos Open Source ships
as a docker image, it has no high availability or fail over functionality. Due to these reasons we have developed Kerberos Enterprise, which is suitable for managing a large scale of surveillance cameras, and makes sure they keep running.

To provide the high availability and fail over requirements customers have, Kerberos Enterprise was built on top of Kubernetes (k8s). This container orchestrator, Kubernetes, allows us to scale a video surveillance landscape vertically.
